examples: Absidia tieghemii Deckenb., Bot. Zap. 5: 254. 1896 (Fungal name); Ulva lactuca f. foraminata Deckenbach, Bot. Zap. 4(1) [i.e. 9]: 14. 1893, nom. nud. (algal example)
notes: TL-2, Suppl. mentions: ​​​​Deckenbach, Konstantin Nikolajewitsch von (?-1920), Russian botanist especially interested in fungi and algae, died 1920 at Charkov (an error)
source: CMI; Forenames & Dates in: Lipschitz S.Yu. (1950): Botanicorum Rossicorum Lexicon Biographo-Bibliographicum. Vol. 3. Moscow: Izdatel'stvo Moskovskogo Obshchestva Ispytatelei Priorody. pp. 129-131 (via Alexander B. Doweld; IFPNI)
